description: Focus includes information processing, learning and remembering speech, artistic, musical and athletic performance, invention and other forms of creativity. Students unlock the mind's mysteries using state-of-the-art scientific instrumentation, developing cognitive science knowledge and research skills. The course includes three hours lecture and one three-hour laboratory per week. Prerequisites: Psychology 125, Statistics110, 212 or 263. GE: NST, NSL. Offered every year.
name: Cognit,Learn & Memory
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Psychology 125, Statistics110, 212 or 263. GE: NST, NSL. Offered every year.
title: Cognition, Learning and Memory
